title: Method Statement for Installation of Automatic Transfer Switch
description:
Method Statement for Installation of Automatic Transfer Switch

Document Summary: Method Statement for Installation of Automatic Transfer Switch is Mechanical engineering related document suitable for MEP works. See content details below:

1.) Purpose
This method of statement covers the in-site installations of Automatic Transfer Switch  as defined in the General Specification.

2.)Scope of Work
This procedure will define the method to be used to ensure that the Automatic Transfer Switch installations, on-site assembly, final connection and workmanship are acceptable, correct, safe and conforms the Contract Documents and Specification.

3.) Pre-Installation

3.1) All materials and documentation relevant to this particular section of works shall be checked prior to installation.

3.2   Ensure that the location wherein the panels were installed are accessible, clean and free of debris and foreign materials and suitable for installations.

It is editable according to your preferences
